headline: Proper tattoos done right
in Manchester's heart
hero.subheadline: Right on Thomas Street, we've been Manchester's go-to for quality ink. No fuss, just solid work that stands the test of time.

portfolio.subtitle: Fresh off the needle from our Thomas Street studio

items.title: Small to Medium Pieces
features: Perfect for first tattoos or additions

testimonials.quote: Been going to Thomas Street for years now, never disappointed. Clean studio, friendly artists, proper job done every time.
testimonials.author: Mike D.

testimonials.quote: Got my sleeve finished here last month. Really happy with how it turned out, the shading work is spot on.
testimonials.author: Emma K.

paragraphs: Right in the thick of Manchester's city centre, Thomas Street Tattoo has been a fixture on the local scene for years. We're the studio that locals recommend to their mates - the place you go when you want proper work done without the pretension.

Our approach is simple: listen to what you want, give honest advice, and deliver tattoos that you'll be proud to wear. Whether you're after your first piece or adding to an existing collection, we treat every client with the same care and attention. No rushing, no cutting corners - just solid tattooing in the heart of Manchester.
about.callout: Walk-ins welcome, but booking ahead saves you waiting around
about.imageAlt: Thomas Street Tattoo artist at work

items.question: Do you take walk-ins?
items.answer: Yeah, we do walk-ins when we can fit you in. But honestly, booking ahead is your best bet - especially for anything bigger than a small piece. Give us a ring and we'll sort you out.

items.question: What's your minimum charge?
items.answer: Our shop minimum is £80. That covers small pieces that take an hour or less. Anything bigger gets quoted based on size, detail, and how long it'll take.

items.question: How do I book a consultation?
items.answer: Just give us a call or pop in when you're passing. For bigger custom pieces, we like to have a proper chat about what you're after before we start drawing anything up.

finalCta.headline: Ready for your next tattoo?

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to arrange your appointment.
booking.successMessage: We'll be in touch within 24 hours to confirm your appointment details.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit secures your booking and comes off your final price
